99F6749122F34093AB2791CC68E5BB56.description: Conduct investigations to explain the causes of various astronomical phenomena that can be observed from Earth

0D694235B83644A0B453B1AC468C0E42.description: Summarize observational evidence used to support theories about the origin and evolution of the universe and the solar system, considering diverse ways of knowing

97B71306C07948A79B7BC59B5EB137B6.description: Explain how the Sunï¿½s energy causes natural phenomena on Earth, and how these phenomena contribute to renewable energy production

DBBC26E025174608952E69B9C85E738B.description: Demonstrate an understanding of the components, characteristics, and associated phenomena of the solar system and the universe, and the importance of the Sun to processes on Earth

09E96233DAA2413B9C08BFBDCDA00595.description: Assess ways in which technological innovations related to space observation and exploration are applied in various fields, including their contributions to sustainable practices on Earth

FBFD244F5FEF4E74B3C9C7F2A1B3B2E6.description: Evaluate how space observation and exploration technologies contribute to our understanding of climate change, natural disasters, and other phenomena

7A99565FB8B04BA994D129C1B795BA9A.description: Explain the difference between electricity and electrical energy

2F1437E662C24BA79E96C017CA67F5F6.description: Identify the components of a direct current (DC) circuit and explain their functions, and identify electrical quantities, their symbols, and their corresponding International System of Units (SI) units

CF17F83FBB0E4721969117B83FF1CDF0.description: Develop a plan of action to address a local or global electrical energy production or consumption issue, including strategies for energy conservation

27E186139D7D4F9CAC14C8E4BDFD57AB.description: Evaluate how electrical energy production and consumption impact various communities locally or globally, and describe ways to achieve sustainable practices

794E8DE545B945BC81BB3A23B1D33481.description: Assess social, environmental, and economic impacts of electrical energy production and consumption, and describe ways to achieve sustainable practices

C5C31B9411524266A5FAB47A8AE6EC84.description: Investigate and explain how sustainable practices used by various communities, including First Nations, Mï¿½tis, and Inuit communities, reflect an understanding of the importance of the dynamic equilibrium of ecosystems

83DCD48DA6E14813AAD78B37CFB90B81.description: Apply scientific processes and an engineering design process in their investigations to develop a conceptual understanding of the science they are learning, and apply coding skills to model scientific concepts and relationships
